channel.title: The New Repost of THE [508] Berky Scape [508]
channel.description:
Hello Moparscapers! I made a 508 server and I really like it, it looks great. And it looks like reall Runescape and I wanted it share this server with you guys! So if you like it leave a post if you don't just feel free to leave you comments.
MAKING YOURSELF AN ADMIN!
Search for login.java in the io folder. Press the Ctrl+f button and search for Code: [Select] Berky change that into you're name or from your mates down it it shows the player rights!
LOOK DOWN FOR NEW PICS!!!
* It has everything goods fully teleporting. * Lunar + Ancients work but some of ancients teles do bug (last one)
Some pics of the server!
[img]http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/6553/duellingfully1sf6.png[/img] [img]http://img244.imageshack.us/img244/8666/bandosboss2kb2.png[/img] [img]http://img26.imageshack.us/img26/5387/drops3xk3.png[/img] [img]http://img99.imageshack.us/img99/179/skillcapeemotes4ux0.png[/img] [img]http://img99.imageshack.us/img99/6017/pickpocketing5xw7.png[/img] [img]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/2569/bounty6yv5.png[/img] [img]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/2766/summoning7zq9.png[/img] [img]http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/2316/zammybowss8rn5.png[/img] [img]http://img25.imageshack.us/img25/7972/clanwars9fq7.png[/img] [img]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/3473/cw10oh8.png[/img] [img]http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/3771/insidecw11rv0.png[/img] [img]http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/3894/wonincw12wx9.png[/img] [img]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/9929/range14ld6.png[/img] [img]http://img25.imageshack.us/img25/224/prayer15ze7.png[/img] [img]http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/7848/slayer16wl3.png[/img] [img]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/7592/fishing17xt6.png[/img] [img]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/4618/woodcutting18vx9.png[/img] [img]http://img25.imageshack.us/img25/4724/firem19xv3.png[/img] [img]http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/8190/mining20yz8.png[/img] [img]http://img25.imageshack.us/img25/9016/smithing21cv9.png[/img] [img]http://img155.imageshack.us/img155/4678/fletchign22da3.png[/img] [img]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/884/hunt23qy9.png[/img] [img]http://img27.imageshack.us/img27/1885/agility24mn6.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/idrn6e.jpg[/img] [img]http://img329.imageshack.us/img329/8024/cons.png[/img]
I hope you guys love this client and source!!!
Client + Source in file
http://www.mediafire.com/?uwdx4ujmqqq
Have fun all you have to do is hit run and it will conect to your ip!!!
Thanks Guys : )
Credit %100 Berky, not me i just reposted

Hello Moparscapers! I made a 508 server and I really like it, it looks great. And it looks like reall Runescape and I wanted it share this server with you guys! So if you like it leave a post if you don’t just feel free to leave you comments.

MAKING YOURSELF AN ADMIN!

Search for login.java in the io folder.
Press the Ctrl+f button and search for
Code: [Select]
Berky change that into you’re name or from your mates down it it shows the player rights!

LOOK DOWN FOR NEW PICS!!!

* Lunar + Ancients work but some of ancients teles do bug (last one)
